meanings.definition: The length of time that a person has lived or a thing has existed.
meanings.sent1: My grandma always tells stories about her age when she was young.
meanings.sent2: In the history book, they talked about the Stone Age and the Bronze Age.
meanings.sent3: At the family reunion, everyone joked about the age of the oldest member.
meanings.sent4: The age of the ancient tree in the forest seemed to whisper secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The age of the universe is a mind-boggling concept to grasp.

meanings.sent1: The Middle Ages were a time of knights and castles.
meanings.sent2: We learned about the Ice Age in science class.
meanings.sent3: The age of dinosaurs must have been a wild time to be alive!
meanings.sent4: Exploring the age of exploration in social studies was fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The age of the Vikings was full of adventure and discovery.

meanings.definition: To grow old or show signs of growing old.
meanings.sent1: My dog seems to age faster than I do.
meanings.sent2: As the years pass, we all age and gain wisdom.
meanings.sent3: The painting on the wall started to age and crack over time.
meanings.sent4: The antique clock aged gracefully, becoming more beautiful with each passing year.
meanings.sent5: Watching the old building age gave it a sense of character and charm.
